channel.title: CVE Feed for Rejetto -- HTTP File Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rejetto -- HTTP File Server

item.title: CVE-2024-23692|2024-05-31T12:55:57.980Z -- rejetto -- http%20file%20server
item.description: Rejetto HTTP File Server, up to and including version 2.3m, is vulnerable to a template injection vulnerability. This vulnerability allows a remote, unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the affected system by sending a specially crafted HTTP request. As of the CVE assignment date, Rejetto HFS 2.3m is no longer supported.

item.title: CVE-2024-23692|2024-06-06T14:55:11.138Z -- rejetto -- http%20file%20server
item.description: Rejetto HTTP File Server, up to and including version 2.3m, is vulnerable to a template injection vulnerability. This vulnerability allows a remote, unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the affected system by sending a specially crafted HTTP request. As of the CVE assignment date, Rejetto HFS 2.3m is no longer supported.
